transcript.text: [Music]
hi and welcome you listening to the x 22
report my name is dave and this is
episode 991 a and today's date is jun 7
2016 and the title of the episode is the
economic indicators are now signaling
the collapse is well underway now before
I get started I just want to make an
announcement I uploaded an interview
with pics where it is on the x 22 report
spotlight youtube channel so you can go
right over to that channel just type in
x 22 report spotlight I'll bring it
right to the channel you see the video
there you can play it or you can come
over to the x 22 airport com site you
can scroll down a little bit look over
to the right hand side you'll see the
video there you can play it there or you
can go to news sentinel com same things
scroll down a little bit look over to
your right hand side and you can play
the video there let's get into the
economic collapse financial news now
many people right into me and and I wish
I could respond to every single person
that wrote in to me but it's physically
impossible actually I would never be
able to get to the reports and I was
reading over some of these emails and I
don't want to mention people's names but
many people are confused and what's
happening in the economy and they're
looking around and they're saying to
themselves okay if the economy is
collapsing like dave is saying why do i
see people out shopping why do i see
people at sporting events why do i see
people doing everyday things well let's
think about this for a second i know
many people that as they were losing
their job as they were still looking for
another job back in two thousand eight
they kept the illusion alive that
everything was fine they used credit
cards they kept doing their everyday
things all the different clubs they were
they belong to they kept all the
activities their children were in they
kept they made it seem like everything
was okay and they just kept on doing it
and many people today and
no it's hard to say they don't like to
give up what they have for many it's
very very difficult and I understand
this and many people that I know
continue with the illusion everyone has
credit cards think about it in today's
economy if we took away all credit cards
and nobody has any credit how many
people do you think would have the
ability to survive every day with food
with purchasing fuel for your car making
payments now there's going to be a
population out there that yes they have
the ability to pay for all of this
because they make enough money and yes
there are still people out there that
are making money and then you can have
the general population which is probably
a very large percentage where they
wouldn't be able to survive and I see it
every single day where people are
putting things on credit cards and
continually running the debt higher and
higher our society has been built on
debt do a little experiment with
yourself try living without credit now
there are many people out there saying
well I don't have any credit cards and
it's very difficult to live right now
there are other saying I wouldn't be
able to survive whatsoever if I removed
them that's it for me and what's
happening in our economy is we're stuck
in this illusion because when you pay
for something on credit you really don't
have the money if you have a balance on
your credit card you never had the money
to do what you're doing and a lot of
people out there are doing this now I'm
not putting anyone down for this I'm not
saying it's wrong but this is how many
of the people out there survive today
and the illusion that people are doing
okay that people can go to these events
people can go on vacations
many people just whip out the credit
card and they make the small little tiny
payments because you can take it you can
charge something for a thousand two
thousand dollars and make that whatever
it is 60 70 forty dollars a month
payment but eventually what happens is
it catches up with you especially if you
lose your job and you're looking for a
job things become very very difficult
and those people that have gone through
it realize it those people that lost
their jobs never got the same pay high
paying job that they had before they'd
have except a part-time job but still
had their bills still had the credit
card bills still had the electric bill
still had the car payment bill it is
very difficult to get by and this is why
we're seeing everyone out there today
and it looks like nothing is going on
but when you start to talk to those
people you start to realize that there
are many many problems I know someone
that lives in the area where I am and
he's been out of work for a year he got
a job two months later he was laid off
once again but they keep the illusion
alive and they keep doing the things
they're doing they haven't stopped so
whatever they had saved in the bank
whatever credit cards they have they're
continually using it but what we're
seeing in the economy is that all the
economic indicators they are signaling
the economy is collapsing now back in
two thousand eight if we track this all
the way up to the point when it
collapsed we would have seen it we would
have seen all of it building building
building until the collapse occurred
because it just doesn't happen on that
day when the market comes down people
might think it does but it doesn't but
builds over time and the US government
and central bank they've been keeping
the illusion alive and many people buy
into the illusion that everything is
okay but those people that are laid off
who believe that the
rate is f four-point-seven percent are
scratching their heads why can't I find
out the job those people that are
employed and it continually receiving a
paycheck they believe that everything is
fine until everything is not now we
realize that there's a lot of people out
there who are nervous about the economy
and we are starting to see that gold and
silver sales they are increasing we see
the Canadian Silver Maple Leaf it has
surged in the first quarter of 2016 and
they've just made a new record the mints
sold a stunning 10.6 million ounces a
twenty-seven percent increase over the
sales from the first quarter of 2015 now
we're also seeing that they sold 1
million ounces more than their all-time
record seen in the third quarter of 2015
so sales of gold and silver they are up
nearly twenty percent this year over
last and we we understand why people are
looking at the economy and slowly but
surely they're purchasing gold and
silver to protect their wealth and when
we look at these economic indicators we
see that things are rapidly falling
apart Ralph Lauren well they're
expecting a double-digit decline the
company is going to be laying off a
thousand workers or about eight percent
of its full-time staff they're going to
be closing stores and we're starting to
see a lot of this from the retailers
where they're saying sales aren't where
they're supposed to be and this is
another indicator of how the economies
are falling apart because when economies
fall apart things contract we see the
American worker productivity well it is
fallen in the first quarter down by
point six percent this is the weakest to
quarter tumble in
productivity since the fourth quarter of
2012 this is the third quarterly drop in
output in a row and what we're seeing is
America well it's in trouble because
productivity is dead in the water and it
doesn't look good factory orders they're
continually slowly contracting and in
April of 2016 orders fell by 2.7% from
April of 2015 and the cumulative total
for the first four months of this year
was two-point-three percent less than
the same months the year before now
factory orders they have been in
contraction for 18 months this is
incredible and that is four months
longer then during the Great Recession
and also two months longer than the
dot-com recession so the president the
Fed they're trying to tell us that
everything is okay but from the evidence
from the facts everything is not the
Baltic Dry Index it is fallen by one
point it's down to 606 and something
very interesting about the stock market
we're continually see the stocks moving
up of course the corporate media is all
over it they're telling us how great the
economy is doing look how great the
stock market is going to be it's going
to continually go up and up and up it's
never going to come down and actually if
you go back to two thousand eight right
before the stock market collapsed they
said the same exact thing actually they
said it about housing and guess what
happened it all fell apart so what we're
seeing at this point in time that
they're getting desperate throughout
last week anytime stocks have begun to
correct or drop someone has bought the
SP 500 futures to prop the market up
three days in a row stocks opened down
and someone immediately stepped in and
began
buying aggressively well this is a sign
of manipulation because the buying halt
almost the moment the stocks get to 2100
on the sp500 at this point the
manipulation ends and because there are
a few real investors in the market today
all of a sudden the market starts to
retreat and we've been noticing this
pattern very interesting because what
the US government what the central banks
are doing is they're trying to keep this
illusion alive as long as they possibly
can and we know that the economy is
deteriorating we know that things are
rapidly falling apart and Obama he
decided to take this to the next level
because we have to remember the US
government central bankers they really
want to blame this on some other
countries some other group and they want
to provoke other countries and other
groups into starting something so we can
see right now the Obama administration
decided to put a total ban on Chinese
steel gave the green light to us steel
to seek china import ban and we're going
to have to see what this is because
we're looking at trade wars right now we
had had currency wars we're into trade
wars now and once we're done with trade
wars what happens we move into real war
now the IMF they have confirmed a
nightmare scenario and an Austrian
central banker said that the ECB
asset-backed security purchasing program
hasn't been successful as they'd hope so
the ECB admitted that all of this that
they've been doing does not work he said
there's simply not enough bonds to buy
and
the program's many inherent absurdities
are the glaring disparity between the
size of the program and the amount of
net euro fixed income issuance and the
more nuanced fact that the effects of
previous ECB easing efforts virtually
ensure that QE cannot succeed and we
know that QE does not help the everyday
person we know that QE doesn't really
prompt the economy up QE props the
bankers up props corporations up props
the central bankers up props the elite
up and leaves the rest of us scratching
my head saying what just happened here
now something big always happens right
before an official recession and we
talked about this before and its
continuing and when temp jobs start to
decline this is a signal and we talked
about this a couple reports back and the
temp job scenario well it's continually
declining and it's accelerating so when
we look at the temp jobs what do we say
well in the last two recessions we saw
the same exact pattern when economic
conditions start to change temporary
workers are often affected before anyone
else why is that well temporary workers
are easier to higher than other types of
work and they're also easier to fire in
May the US economy lost another 21,000
temporary jobs and overall we've lost
64,000 temp jobs since December this is
another indicator that the economy is
collapsing and this is why everyone
needs to be prepared all we are seeing
right now indicator after indicator
after indicator it is showing us that
this whole economy is getting ready to
implode I
you need to make sure you have shoot a
food you need to make sure you have
water you need to make sure that you
have a weapon to protect your family you
need to make sure that you have
batteries you need to make sure that you
have toiletries have these things on
hand because you don't want to be out
there when things rapidly fall apart you
can go to costco you can get whatever
you need there you can go to life
reliance calm they have bug out bags
they have emergency food they deliver
right to your door you can go to the
supermarket you can get your products
from there does it matter where you get
them from no as long as you stock up as
long as you are prepared because you're
going to be those people saying wow I
knew this was coming I have everything I
need just like if there was a hurricane
coming or a snowstorm coming or anything
like that you are prepared for what is
about to happen now sometimes we see
people not prepared and they scratch
their head saying oh i thought the storm
was going to pass but it didn't and then
we have those people that are prepared
saying i knew this was coming I have
everything I need and this collapse that
is headed our way from everything that
we looked at from GDP all the way down
to unemployment and everything in
between it's deteriorating faster and
faster this is why the government and
the central bank continually come out
there and tell you how everything is
doing well and you're going to see them
make more appearances to tell you that
everything is okay because they need to
tell you it's contained that everything
is okay and everything's going to be
alright as we get closer and closer to
the collapse listen everyone thanks a
lot for listening be well be safe and
especially be prepared thanks a lot
you
[Music]
you
